heading: Koi Kasar Utha Na Rakhna
title: Koi Kasar Utha Na Rakhna
content:
کوئ قصر اٹھا نا رکھنا (koi kasar utha na rakhna) is an Urdu idiom. The English counterpart can be any of the followings:

Leave No Stone Unturned

پاکستان اور سریلنکا کا سیمی فائنل اتوار کو کھیلا گیا جس میں پاکستان نے ہارنے کے لئے کوئ قصر اٹھا نہ چھوڑی۔

Semi final between Pakistan and India was played on Sunday in which Pakistan left no stone unturned trying to loose.


Try utmost

I'll try my utmost to pass the CSS exams this time.


Try best

Though the catch was dropped he tried his best to get hold of it.
